title: Adventures with Barefoot Critters
description: "This is a very special ABC book with beautiful animal illustrations and imaginative sentences for each letter." - Seira Wilson, Amazon EditorJoin an adorable cast of animal characters as they explore the alphabet through the seasons. From gathering honey in spring to building cozy campfires in fall, the friends make the most of each season, both enjoying the great outdoors and staying snug inside. Learning the alphabet is fun when adventuring with these critters, and children and adults alike will delight in Teagan White's sweet, nostalgic illustrations.
author: Teagan White
